attributes.action: BRING BACK THE DEATH PENALTY IN ENGLAND
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to bring to death penalty back.. In cases like  Torture, Rape, Murder, etc.  We have all be deeply deeply moved by the baby P case and this case is the case that should be made an example of, so it never happens again.!! why should the people who commit these crimes be allowed to have a new identity after serving a short prison sentence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
